actions.Multiattack: The tyrannosaurus makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail. It can't make both attacks against the same target.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +10+1d6 + 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 33 (4d12 + 7) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 17+1d6 + 14). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the tyrannosaurus can't bite another target.
actions.Tail: Melee Weapon Attack: +10+1d6 + 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage.
